sentences.en: Despite its two - ton, two - story - high hulk, this poor robot is living in its head.
sentences.cn: 尽管重二吨并有两层楼那么高, 这个可怜虫却只靠它的头活着.

sentences.en: Great waves formed and spread as the hulk rose to the surface.
sentences.cn: 当这巨大笨重的船露出水面时,水面泛起了巨大的波浪又向四面散去.

sentences.en: He was just this hulk of a guy and he was old school.
sentences.cn: 他是个很传统的大块头.

sentences.en: I could make out the gutted hulk of the tanker.
sentences.cn: 我可以辨认出油船破烂不堪的残骸。

sentences.en: I followed his big hulk into the house.
sentences.cn: 我跟在他魁梧的身躯后面进了屋子。

sentences.en: I saw a rotting hulk on the beach.
sentences.cn: 我在海滩上看见了一艘腐烂的废船.

sentences.en: The Hulk has already earned millions.
sentences.cn: 它已经赚了数百万美元.

sentences.en: the hulk of a wrecked ship
The stranded hulk a severely damaged ship.
sentences.cn: 一条鲸鱼在岸上搁浅了.

sentences.en: Well, this was whole process I done to meet the challenge to create the Red Hulk.
sentences.cn: 那么, 这就是整个过程.

trans.tran_cn: 残骸，外壳，笨重的大船，废船船体，巨大笨重的人（物）
trans.tran_en: a large heavy person or thing

trans.tran_cn: 庞然大物般出现；赫然显现
